content.content: image1697×409 41 KB  The current bear market, coupled with the recent growth of new stable currencies with high yields, may be the current factor in the current disincentive to use DAI. @Lozadaluis12 in an internal group we have with @Alefcripto we see several opportunities for growth, but DAO processes may be the factor that can play against.

Honestly speaking on the issue of yields, put the PSM usdc into production, maybe a proportion. The bear market is a reality, if we fall asleep it can be a big problem for Maker, even new algorithmic currencies are coming out that want to attract the attention and liquidity of the market.
